goals__remit:
Hitachi, Ltd., headquartered in Tokyo, Japan, delivers innovations that answer society’s challenges.  
For fiscal year 2017, the Hitachi's consolidated revenues increased 25 to 9368 billion yen. Adjusted operating income increased to 714 billion yen. 
The Hitachi Group is a global leader in the Social Innovation Business, and it has approximately 335,000 employees worldwide. Through collaborative creation, Hitachi is providing solutions to customers in a broad range of sectors, including Power / Energy, Industry / Distribution / Water, Urban Development, and Finance / Government & Public / Healthcare.  
 
For more information on Hitachi, please visit the company's website at http://www.hitachi.com.
